name: Plumbers Brick Judgement
description:
( MADE FOR THE HALLOWEEN MFGG GAMEJAM : https://itch.io/jam/mfgg-halloween-jam)
[ CONTENT INGAME MAY BE NOT SUITABLE FOR YOUNGER AUDIENCES OR THOSE WHO ARE VERY EASILY DISTURBED/SICK.]

One day, Mario wakes up. Not to save the princess. Not to overthrow Bowser. Rather, to take a brisk walk, and see the damage he had done. Bowser transformed all the Toads into bricks and boxes, and will never return.

Mario had made it worse.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Multiple replays of this game are recommended, as there are 3 endings (selected at random), and one secret ending (HINT : Turn back.)

It's likely there will be a much heavily polished, longer, and scarier version of the game, post-jam.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits -

  • Playtesters - SuperMakerPlayer, DIOsaur, ElectroDev, Senarai
  • Ripped Sprites - Super Princess Peach (Toad), Mario Party Advance (Mario)
  • Original Sprites/Edits - Sinopolis Mawboi/Roosara Ruwanga
  • Literally the entire game - Sinopolis Mawboi/Roosara Ruwanga
